body:
Apparently you get free EXP from voting.

But what games get this "Free EXP"?
body_tagged:
Apparently you get free EXP from voting.

But what games get this "Free EXP"?
title: What gamemodes get the "Free XP"

replies.body: any exp, you get an emerald in your bar in the hub, right click and boom comes an interface for xp redeeming in any game, btw its 35 xp
replies.body_tagged: any exp, you get an emerald in your bar in the hub, right click and boom comes an interface for xp redeeming in any game, btw its 35 xp

replies.body:
Ah thanks.

You have to relog though :P

Ah thanks.
